comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: This curve is seen when you climb down about half a mile out of Ojuela (pronounce ohooela), Mapimí, Durango, México. This track, today a road, takes you to Mapimí. See in www.flickr.com/photos/jesusduarte/8500089516/#comments how this place looks today. And see in www.flickr.com/photos/jesusduarte/7000225772/ a rackroad train climbing up to approach Ojuela.
